entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Snow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C

Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
